Welcome to OC-Lettings's documentation!
========================================

Web App Orange County Lettings
------------------------------

This project is carried out as part of the Application Developer training -
Python taught by OpenClassrooms.

Itâ€™s about minimizing the technical debt of the existing web app, Orange County Lettings, and deploying it via a CircleCi pipeline according to a process defined in the :download:`specifications <../documentation/Site_web_2.0_caracteristiques_e_ameliorations.pdf>`.
